DOC.brief_summary: This study intend assess safety tolerability ASP1941 compare placebo adult subject type 2 diabetes mellitus
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Safety Tolerability ASP1941 Adults With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus .
DOC.detailed_description: Trial include two week washout period enter treatment period subject oral anti-diabetic medication .
DOC.criteria: Established diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus HbA1c value 7.0 10.0 % Body mass index 20 45 kg/m2 Established diagnosis type 1 diabetes mellitus Serum creatinine > upper limit normal range Proteinuria ( microalbumin/creatinine ratio > 300 mg/g ) Urinary tract infection Severe uncontrolled Hypertension Significant renal , hepatic cardiovascular disease HIV Positive History drug alcohol abuse/dependency
